passages.text:
You look up to see your Ferryman guide quickly ascending the cistern ladder.  

At the top is a small hatch.  The hatch has a small aperture cut out on the left side, allowing the pale fire of light to pour through.  

[[C->keys]]
passages.name: Exiting Sewer

passages.text:
Jasper,head_tilted::You won't say that.  You *can't* say that. 

[[Why won't you let me say what I want?  Why can't I run away from all this?]]

links.name: Why won't you let me say what I want?  Why can't I run away from all this?
links.link: Why won't you let me say what I want?  Why can't I run away from all this?

passages.name: I've changed my mind, I don't want to go!

passages.text:
The words come out of you as if directed by a puppeteer.

[[C->Open Hatch]]
passages.name: p:Alright, open the hatch.

passages.text:
Jasper,looking_forward::I'm not to blame here.  *You're* the one who won't let you say what you want.  Or rather, what you've decided you "want."  

Jasper::Deep in your bones you know the only way out of here is forward.  
Jasper::I'm not going to stop you if you decide to bail.  I *can't* stop you.  

Jasper::Run wild.  Turn around and run right back to the entrance of these tunnels.  You're pretty in shape right?

Jasper,head_tilted::...Well?  I'm waiting.

[[This isn't fair.  I shouldn't have to do this.]]

links.name: This isn't fair.  I shouldn't have to do this.
links.link: This isn't fair.  I shouldn't have to do this.

passages.name: Why won't you let me say what I want?  Why can't I run away from all this?

passages.text:
Jasper,thinking::Fine, then.  Go die like a baby sea turtle.  That won't be fair either, but life will still pan out that way.

[[Continue->keys]]
passages.name: This isn't fair.  I shouldn't have to do this.

passages.text:
Your Ferryman guide opens the hatch and climbs through.  

You quickly follow, pulling yourself through the portal at the top.
passages.name: Open Hatch

passages.text:
You hear the faint sound of metal grating against metal - he's opening the lock securing the hatch at the top.  His voice reverberates as it echoes down the cylinder.

Ferryman::As soon as I open this hatch you'll need to clamber up the ladder as quickly as possible.  I won't be able to keep it open for long.  Ready?

[[I've changed my mind, I don't want to go!]]
[[p:Alright, open the hatch.]]

links.name: I've changed my mind, I don't want to go!
links.link: I've changed my mind, I don't want to go!

passages.name: keys
